web.title: Web Design & Front-End Development
web.description-main: This website was built with Nuxt, using the shadcn/ui library, Tailwind CSS and the i18n and Color Mode Nuxt Modules.
web.description-second: Auxiliary tools for web apps development: Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator.

photography.title: Photography & Video
photography.description-main: I do some photography in my free time, as well as video editing. I've participated in photography study groups in university and have done freelance photoshoots as well.
